name: Magicar
description:
A cute puzzle platformer in which you control the cloud to help the car move towards a goal.


Controls:

Move - left arrow, right arrow

Perform action - space

Switch clouds - z, x, c 

You move as a cloud that can perform various actions.

  • [Tree cloud] create trees which can block the car or lift the car up
  • [Tornado cloud] create tornado that can reverse the direction of the car
  • [Lightning cloud] burn the tree down
